alert.note: Alert for Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 25 at 10:07AM MST until November 25 at 1:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Visibility less than an 1/8 mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Higher elevations and west slopes of the Sacramento Mountains. Locations include Cloudcroft, Sunspot and vicinity. * WHEN...Until 1 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; West Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet
